categories: Category:Battles of the New Sith Wars

nodes.text: In the early years of the New Sith Wars, this battle was held between the Jedi Order and the Brotherhood of Darkness. One of the combatants was Jedi Master Pernicar, who during the heat of battle spotted his former Padawan, Wud Mortull, fighting for the opposite side. Mortull, upon spotting Pernicar, charged the Jedi Master; however, Pernicar deftly cut Mortull down.
